title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XXXI, pt. 1101 - Scope Of Practice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XXXI, pt. 1101 - Scope Of Practice

State Regulations
§ 1101.1 - Scope of practice for certified general real estate appraiser
§ 1101.2 - Scope of practice for certified residential real estate appraiser
§ 1101.3 - Scope of practice for a licensed residential real estate appraiser
§ 1101.4 - Scope of practice for a licensed real estate appraiser assistant

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XXXI, pt. 1101

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §
160-d[1][e]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
